name: @tufte-markdown/remark-wrap-in-section
description: A remark transformer wrapping document blocks that are started by a level-2 heading in a section to support html that relies on the stylesheets of Edward Tufte

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -i src/index.js -o dist/remark-wrap-in-section.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -i src/index.js -o dist/remark-wrap-in-section.cjs.js

author: Jan Florian Dietrich <jfd@daenen4.de> (http://www.daenen4.de/)
